thread.title: Kylie Jenner Smokes Weed Topless In Bed, Just Like You And Me
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner Smokes Weed Topless In Bed, Just Like You And Me

author: Ian Lang
title: Kylie Jenner Smokes Weed Topless In Bed, Just Like You And Me
text:
Photoshoot Captures Kylie Jenner Topless Smoking Weed In Bed © Kylie Jenner / Instagram Photoshoot Captures Kylie Jenner Topless Smoking Weed In Bed Trending News: Kylie Jenner Smokes Weed Topless In Bed, Just Like You And Me Shares Quick Take 
Make no bones about it, being one of the Kardashian/Jenner clan is hard . Between tipping your location to the paparazzi so they can take pictures, running a makeup business (despite hating both makeup and business ) and throwing yourself lavish birthday parties , you hardly have time to kick back, relax and watch the near-constant coverage of yourself on TV. They can be forgiven, then for wanting to dull their senses a little. 
When big sister Kim wants to let loose a little, she posts some topless selfies . Younger sister and heir-apparent Kylie Jenner apparently likes to do the same — only in her case, toplessness is accompanied by a wee toke of the Devil's lettuce. ? on a wednesday with @sashasamsonova A post shared by Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Mar 1, 2017 at 9:22am PST 
Those were shot by Sasha Samsonova, the same photographer who gifted us Kylie Jenner's nude video around Christmastime. Twitter reacted to the earth-shattering news of a wealthy teenager doing recreational drugs with the kind of restraint you've come to expect: Seeing Kylie Jenner smoke a joint just legit made me like her more ?
